title: Doll
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
You know in all of the time that we've shared
I've never been so scared
Doll me up in my bad luck
I'll meet you there
[Verse 2]
I wish I never had taken this dare
I wasn't quite prepared
Doll me up in my bad luck
Uh-huh-uh, uh-uh-uh-uh
Doll me up in my bad luck
I'll meet you there
